modules.name: Mathematics 1
modules.description: Fundamental mathematical concepts including algebra, calculus, and analytical geometry.

modules.name: Programming Fundamentals
modules.description: Introduction to programming concepts using a high-level programming language.

modules.name: Computer Architecture
modules.description: Basic concepts of computer organization and architecture.

modules.name: Algorithms and Data Structures
modules.description: Study of fundamental algorithms and data structures for efficient problem solving.

modules.name: Database Management Systems
modules.description: Principles of database design, implementation, and management.

modules.name: Software Engineering
modules.description: Software development methodologies, project management, and quality assurance.

modules.name: Network Security
modules.description: Principles of network security, cryptography, and secure communication protocols.
